p: The differences in future crop yields impacts between the reference scenario and the policy scenarios (see lower panels of FiguresÂ 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12) vary from basin to basin, largely due to differences in climate change patterns and atmospheric CO 2 concentration (different level of CO 2 fertilization) between scenarios. Overall, the simulations under the two emission mitigation policies show a large variety of impacts on irrigated yields across basins, which makes it difficult to identify the role of mitigation on total U.S. production from the maps.
